title: How to Make Dragon Fruit Jam

steps.title: Assemble all of your ingredients.
steps.content: Assemble all of your ingredients. Cut the dragon fruit in half and scoop out the pulp, squeeze out the juice from the lemon, measure your sugar and butter etc.

steps.title: Pour in the juice, crack the eggs, add the sugar, butter and dragon fruit pulp in a mixing bowl and whisk until all the ingredients are combined together.
steps.content: Pour in the juice, crack the eggs, add the sugar, butter and dragon fruit pulp in a mixing bowl and whisk until all the ingredients are combined together.

steps.title: Pour the whisked mixture into a double boiler.
steps.content: Pour the whisked mixture into a double boiler.

steps.title: Cook over a low and steady heat.
steps.content: Cook over a low and steady heat. Stir frequently. The mixture will begin to thicken as you stir, over a period of about half an hour. [1] X Research source Add some sugar if it is not sweet enough, or water if it's too sweet. Check to see if it's thick enough.

steps.title: Pour the jam in a container or jar and seal.
steps.content: Pour the jam in a container or jar and seal. Finished - spread your jam on a bread etc.

steps.title: Pour in all of the contents except for the sugar in a double boiler.
steps.content: Pour in all of the contents except for the sugar in a double boiler.

steps.title: Cook over low and steady heat and constantly stir until the mixture is soft.
steps.content: Cook over low and steady heat and constantly stir until the mixture is soft.

steps.title: Add in the sugar and increase the heat.
steps.content: Add in the sugar and increase the heat.

steps.title: Keep stirring cautiously until the mixture feels thickened.
steps.content: Keep stirring cautiously until the mixture feels thickened. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Taste the mixture if it is nice.
steps.content: Taste the mixture if it is nice. If too sweet add in more water; if not sweet, add in more sugar.

steps.title: Pour the jam in a container or jar and seal.
steps.content: Pour the jam in a container or jar and seal. Finished - spread your jam on a bread etc.
